projects.title: KARIBA RED+- ZIMBABWE
projects.subtitle: Reduced Emissions from Deforestation and Degradation
projects.description: Protects forests and wildlife on the southem shores of Lake Kariba in Zimbabwe, forming a giant biodiversity corridor.

projects.title: ARCATA SUNNYBRAE TRACT - USA
projects.subtitle: Improved Forest Management
projects.description: Preservation of large tracts of coastal Redwood and Douglas fir that were slated for harvesting by the timber company.

projects.title: WOLF CREEK LANDFILL - USA
projects.subtitle: Landfill Methane Gas Capture
projects.description: Landfill methane gas-to-energy facility that provides significant environmental benefits to the surrounding area.

projects.title: TERRAPASS MIXED PORTFOLIO - MIXED
projects.subtitle: Mixed
projects.description: Greenhouse gas reductions made at a variety of projects, including: reforestation, methane capture, and renewable energy.

projects.title: GASTON COUNTY LANDFILL - USA
projects.subtitle: Landfill Methane Gas Capture
projects.description: Voluntary collection and destruction of landfill methane in two open flares and three internal combustion engine generators.

projects.title: MYAMYN CONSERVATION - AUSTRALIA
projects.subtitle: Reforestation & Hyrdopower
projects.description: Supporting biodiversity and reforestration in Victoria, Australia; along with carbon reduction from a hyrdopower plant in Vietnam.

projects.title: NATURAL PACT LAND ART - COSTA RICA
projects.subtitle: Reforestation through Land Art
projects.description: Unique 'land art' reforestation and conservation of forests that extend an important biological corridor for many endangered species.

projects.title: NATURE LAB URBAN FORESTY - CANADA
projects.subtitle: Urban Reforestation
projects.description: Rehabilitating degraded urban and sub-urban areas through reforestation, adding significant greenery and restoring biodiversity.
